subject: My Wakizashi.
msgSnippet: I also got this one from my grandfather.  I emailed the Japanese sword society and they told me based off the signature that it was Koto.

I also got this one from my grandfather.  I emailed the Japanese 
sword society and they told me based off the signature that it was 
Koto.
